content.metaDescriptions: Hertz Entertainment Services and Cinelease are available 24/7 and ready to help.  Give us a call, email us or contact us directly via the website and we'll begin personalizing a package to fit your needs.
content.pageTitle: <dcs:content target="/content/dcs/hes/US/enUS/contact_us_confirmation/jcr:content/pageTitle@value">Contact Us - Equipment, Vehicle and Lighting Rentals</dcs:content>
content.generalInfo: <dcs:content target="/content/dcs/hes/US/enUS/contact_us_confirmation/jcr:content/generalInfo@value">Thank you for contacting us. We will reply to your message soon.</dcs:content>
content.contactUsConfirmText: <dcs:content target="/content/dcs/hes/US/enUS/contact_us_confirmation/jcr:content/contactUsConfirmText@value">Thank you for your inquiry. Your questions/comments have been submitted in regard to '<%= subject %>' submission.</dcs:content>
